item.title: 印尼新内阁再次任命财政部长因德拉瓦蒂
item.description: 印度尼西亚总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）周日再次任命斯里-穆利亚尼-因德拉瓦蒂（Sri Mulyani Indrawati）为国家财政部长，这标志着东南亚最大经济体的政策连续性。【原文：Indonesia’s President Prabowo Subianto reappointed Sri Mulyani Indrawati as the nation’s finance minister on Sunday, in a sign of policy continuity in Southeast Asia’s largest economy.】

item.title: 苹果新款迷你 iPad 彰显公司秘密的人工智能优势
item.description: 苹果公司的新款 iPad mini 彰显了公司在人工智能领域的秘密优势。还有Sonos在经历了低迷的起步后重启耳机；亚马逊推出彩色Kindle；Jony Ive设计的夹克上市。在管理方面，苹果公司的首席人事官和顶级招聘官离职，公司任命了新的硬件领导人。【原文：Apple’s new iPad mini highlights the company’s secret advantage in artificial intelligence. Also: Sonos weighs a headphone reboot after a sluggish start; Amazon rolls out a color Kindle; and Jony Ive-designed jackets arrive. On the management front, Apple’s chief people officer and top recruiter depart, and the company names new hardware leaders.】

item.title: ASML 显示芯片领域的鸿沟：人工智能赢家与其他人的对比
item.description: 在价值 5300 亿美元的半导体行业中，人工智能浪潮中的公司和非人工智能浪潮中的公司之间的鸿沟越来越大。而从本财报季的早期回报来看，这一鸿沟可能很快就会扩大到深渊。【原文：There’s a growing divide in the $530 billion semiconductor industry between the companies that are riding the artificial intelligence wave and those that aren’t. And looking at the early returns from this earnings season, that gulf could soon widen into an abyss.】

item.title: 对美联储 "错误启动 "的担忧让新兴市场陷入困境
item.description: 世界上一些对风险最敏感的资产的价格走势表明，人们担心美联储开始降息的决定可能为时过早— 或可能无法持续。【原文：Price action in some of the world’s most risk-sensitive assets is signaling concern that the Federal Reserve’s decision to begin lowering interest rates may have been premature — or may not be sustainable.】

item.title: 法国总理称法国左翼加税提案 "难以忍受
item.description: 法国总理米歇尔-巴尼耶（Michel Barnier）表示，左翼反对党提出的数百亿欧元的增税计划将 "难以承受"，因为这将削弱企业和家庭的购买力。【原文：French Prime Minister Michel Barnier says tens of billions of euros of tax increases proposed by left-wing opposition parties would be “unbearable” as they would undermine business and households’ purchasing power.】

item.title: 沙特额外公司在利雅得首次公开募股热潮中出让金融部门 30% 的股份
item.description: 总部位于沙特阿拉伯的联合电子公司（又称 Extra）将继续在沙特主要市场上市其金融服务部门 30% 的股份。【原文：Saudi Arabia-based United Electronics Co., known as Extra, will proceed with the listing of a 30% stake in its financial services unit on the Saudi main market.】

item.title: 香港新鸿基连续第三周售出所有启德单位
item.description: 新鸿基地产（Sun Hung Kai Properties）出售了香港一个主要住宅项目的所有公寓，这标志着该项目连续第三周在一天内被抢购一空，因为买家利用了折扣和政府的房地产宽松措施。【原文：Sun Hung Kai Properties sold all apartments on offer at a key residential project in Hong Kong, marking the third straight week the units have been snapped up in a day as buyers take advantage of discounts and government property-easing measures.】

item.title: 不列颠哥伦比亚省接近尾声的投票显示没有出现强有力的多数派
item.description: 投票日当天，加拿大不列颠哥伦比亚省的选举悬而未决，左翼新民主党的多数党地位成疑，而自二战前以来从未统治过该地区的新民主党的支持率却大幅飙升。【原文：A election in Canada’s British Columbia province was too close to call on polling day, leaving the left-leaning New Democratic Party’s majority in doubt while support soared for a party that has not ruled the region since before World War II.】

item.title: 意大利埃尼公司寻求出售最多 49% 的生物甲烷股份
item.description: 据 Corriere della Sera 报道，埃尼公司已聘请法国投资银行 Natixis SA 寻找有意购买其生物甲烷业务 Enibioch4in Spa 少数股权的投资者。【原文：Eni Spa has hired the French investment bank Natixis SA to search for investors interested in buying a minority stake in Enibioch4in Spa, its biomethane operation, Corriere della Sera reported.】

item.title: 了解与七国集团相抗衡的金砖国家集团
item.description: 由新兴市场国家组成的金砖五国集团（BRICS），是巴西、俄罗斯、印度、中国和南非的缩写，已经从二十年前投资银行的一个口号，变成了一个控制着多边贷款机构的现实世界俱乐部。到2024年，它的规模几乎翻了一番，使几个主要能源生产国与一些发展中国家中最大的消费国结成对子，并有可能增强该集团在美国主导的世界中的经济影响力。还有数十个国家表示有意加入该集团。【原文：The BRICS group of emerging-market powers — the acronym stands for Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa — has gone from a slogan dreamed up at an investment bank two decades ago to a real-world club that controls a multilateral lender. It almost doubled in size in 2024, pairing several major energy producers with some of the biggest consumers among developing countries and potentially enhancing the group’s economic clout in a US-dominated world. Dozens more countries have expressed inte】

item.title: 陈国强：香港将采取措施促进黄金交易
item.description: 香港财政司司长陈茂波周日在其博客中写道，香港将推出多项措施，以成为黄金和其他商品的国际贸易中心。【原文：Hong Kong will roll out several measures with the aim of becoming an international trading center for gold and other commodities, Financial Secretary Paul Chan wrote in his blog Sunday.】

item.title: 资金短缺的英国向陷入困境的公司催缴欠税
item.description: 破产专家表示，英国税务局正在采取更强硬的措施来追回债务，以榨取 50 亿英镑（约合 65 亿美元）的额外收入，这增加了企业倒闭的压力。【原文：The UK tax office is taking a tougher approach to clawing back debts, insolvency specialists said, a bid to squeeze £5 billion ($6.5 billion) in extra revenue that is adding to pressure on firms going out of business.】

item.title: 随着 "动物精神 "回归，亚洲首次公开募股将迎来大热一周
item.description: 亚洲股市正在为两年多来最繁忙的上市周做准备，这将是对需求的一次重要考验，因为各公司都赶在美国大选之前筹集资金。【原文：Asia’s stock markets are gearing up for their busiest week of listings in more than two years, offering a crucial test of demand as companies rush to raise money before the US election.】

item.title: 西南航空与激进分子埃利奥特开始和解讨论
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）和美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines Co.【原文：Elliott Investment Management and Southwest Airlines Co. have begun discussing a potential settlement that would avoid a proxy fight for control of the airline’s board, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 全球 1,000 万亿美元财政定时炸弹仍在滴答作响
item.description: 甚至在全球金融首脑们未来几天飞抵华盛顿之前，国际货币基金组织就已经提前敦促他们勒紧裤腰带。【原文：Even before global finance chiefs fly into Washington over the next few days, they’ve been urged in advance by the International Monetary Fund to tighten their belts.】

item.title: 印度航空乘客在纽约因虚假炸弹威胁而延误行程
item.description: 印度航空公司周六从孟买飞抵纽约的乘客因虚假炸弹威胁而延误，这是该航空公司本月收到的一连串虚假警报中的又一起。【原文：Air India passengers arriving in New York from Mumbai on Saturday were delayed by a hoax bomb threat, adding to a string of false alarms the carrier has received this month.】

item.title: 巴西监管机构指控美洲航空公司前首席执行官进行内幕交易
item.description: 巴西证券监管机构指控 Americanas SA 前首席执行官米格尔-古铁雷斯（Miguel Gutierrez）等七人涉嫌内幕交易，称他们在这家零售巨头的重大会计丑闻曝光前不当使用了特权信息。【原文：Brazil’s securities regulator accused former Americanas SA chief executive officer Miguel Gutierrez and seven others of insider trading, alleging they improperly used privileged information before the disclosure of a major accounting scandal at the retail giant.】

item.title: TGI Friday's 寻求新融资为破产做准备
item.description: 据知情人士透露，TGI Friday's Inc.正在寻求融资，因为这家休闲餐饮连锁店准备在未来几周内申请破产保护。【原文：TGI Friday’s Inc. is seeking financing as the casual-dining chain prepares to file for bankruptcy protection in coming weeks, according to people with knowledge of its plans, after struggling to turn around a business pressured by customers’ tighter budgets and preference for faster food.】

item.title: 印度经济繁荣将推动私人信贷和债券扩张：信贷周刊
item.description: 现在，与任何国际金融界人士交谈，话题迟早会转向印度。印度的债券正被纳入全球指数，吸引了市场上一些押注强劲经济增长的大型基金经理。【原文：Talk with anyone in international finance now, and the discussion will sooner or later turn to India. The country’s bonds are being added to global indexes, drawing some of the market’s biggest fund managers who are betting on strong economic growth.】

item.title: 比特币矿工在收入 "减半 "六个月后走上不同道路
item.description: 在比特币网络上验证交易的奖励减少一半的六个月后，加密货币挖矿公司正在两条不同的道路中做出选择，以维持生存。【原文：Six months after rewards for validating transactions on the Bitcoin network were reduced by half, crypto mining companies are choosing between two divergent paths to remain viable.】

item.title: HDFC 银行批准旗下 HDB 金融公司 15 亿美元首次公开募股
item.description: 印度最大的私营银行--HDFC 银行有限公司旗下的 HDB 金融服务有限公司计划通过首次公开募股筹集多达 1,250 亿卢比（15 亿美元）的资金，为印度股票市场上的首次公开募股再添大手笔。【原文：HDB Financial Services Ltd., a unit of India’s largest private sector lender, HDFC Bank Ltd. plans to raise as much as 125 billion rupees ($1.5 billion) through an initial public offering, further adding to big debuts in the nation’s equity markets.】

item.title: 华尔街周刊建设一个更美好的世界银行需要哪些条件
item.description:
世界银行即将在华盛顿召开会议

The World Bank will soon meet in Washington

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯的下一个千兆项目是利雅得的一个巨大立方体
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯正准备开始其下一个千兆工程的建设工作：一座足以容纳 20 座帝国大厦的立方体摩天大楼。【原文：Saudi Arabia is preparing to begin construction work on its next giga-project: a cube-shaped skyscraper big enough to fit 20 Empire State Buildings.】

item.title: 存款增长强劲，HDFC 银行利润超出预期
item.description: 在存款和贷款强劲增长的帮助下，印度最大的私人贷款机构 HDFC 银行有限公司第二季度利润超出分析师预期。【原文：HDFC Bank Ltd., India’s largest private lender, second-quarter profit came ahead of analysts’ expectations helped by strong growth in deposits and loans.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长维勒鲁瓦预计明年初通胀率将达到 2
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒罗伊-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧元区消费价格增长率可能将在 2025 年初达到 2% 的目标。【原文：Euro-area consumer-price growth probably will be at the European Central Bank’s 2% target in early 2025, according the Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚通过国际货币基金组织贷款审查，释放 3.407 亿美元付款
item.description: 国际货币基金组织执行董事会完成了对埃塞俄比亚扩大信贷机制的首次审查，该机制将向这个东非国家发放约 3.407 亿美元。【原文：The International Monetary Fund’s executive board completed its first review under the Extended Credit Facility for Ethiopia, which will disburse about $340.7 million to the East African country.】

item.title: 油价显示交易商对美国制裁的麻木程度
item.description: 一周前，美国政府对伊朗的石油贸易实施了更多制裁。此后，原油价格每桶下跌了 5 美元以上。【原文：A week ago, the US government imposed yet more sanctions on Iran’s oil trade. Crude prices have sagged more than $5 a barrel since.】

item.title: 里夫斯在高风险预算案中将债券市场置于英国大臣之上
item.description: 蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）要在本月底提交一份微妙平衡的英国预算，面临的第一个挑战就是赢得日益叛变的工党的支持。【原文：Rachel Reeves’ first challenge when it comes to delivering a delicately balanced UK budget at the end of the month is winning over an increasingly mutinous Labour Party.】

item.title: 反移民政党崛起，肖尔茨寻求海外所需工人
item.description: 里卡多-苏亚雷斯-达席尔瓦（Ricardo Soares da Silva）并不后悔从祖国巴西来到多山的德国南部，从事一份收入更高的电气技术员工作。【原文：Ricardo Soares da Silva has no regrets about swapping his native Brazil for hilly southern Germany and a higher-paying job as an electrical technician.】

item.title: 香港长期服务的市场监管机构蔡氏据说将离职
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，随着 Keith Choy 准备卸任，香港将失去一位任职时间最长的市场监管人员。【原文：Hong Kong is losing one of its longest-serving markets regulators as Keith Choy prepares to step down, according to people familiar with the matter.】
